Reviews.Title: “Works for the Price”
Reviews.Author: SCagray
Reviews.Content: hotel exactly looking trip stay clean affordable close train station crash flight walked station minimal luggage saved cab fare spent weeks throughout italy low funds plenty eat nice goodbye rome

Reviews.Title: “Awesome location on a tight budget.”
Reviews.Author: rhirhi11
Reviews.Content: tight budget fit secure safe service awesome housekeeping reception werent flash clean internet reliable location awesome 5 minutes termini via cavour awesome

Reviews.Title: “great location but yuck!”
Reviews.Author: BellaMurphy86
Reviews.Content: location hotel absolutely fantastic staff helpful bit dump double dirty tired basic shared bathroom joke shower close toilet sit properly shower constantly blocked pool water ankles guess pay

Reviews.Title: “Location and Price”
Reviews.Author: jojotn
Reviews.Content: spent days rome prior cruise 4 children mother booked hotel close arrived arriving rome 8am allday exhausted informed bumped due guests decided leave day supposed leave credit hotel booked hotel cavour perfectly adequate probably nicer original hotel location proximity termini station definitely plus spacious especially europe figuring key card lights staff helpful friendly included breakfast value price 200 euro night definitely stay
